sourceDesc.p: Produced from collation output prepared in batch file processing on 2023-10-29 20:26:29.546616 .
Edited to correct alignments and prepared for the Frankenstein Variorum spine on 2026-01-19T12:13:22.538721-05:00.

text.body:
<div type="collation" xml:id="Unit_C20">
<seg xml:id="C20_app1-fMS_start"/> <anchor type="collate" xml:id="C20"/><lb n="c57-0031__main__1"/> <seg xml:id="C20_app1-fMS_end"/> <milestone spanTo="#ci57-0031.11" unit="tei:head"/> <sga-add hand="#pbs" sID="c57-0031__main__d4e4824"/> <seg xml:id="C20_app3-fMS_start"/> another Chapter <sga-add eID="c57-0031__main__d4e4824"/><anchor xml:id="c57-0031.11"/><lb n="c57-0031__main__2"/>Sometime <seg xml:id="C20_app3-fMS_end"/> elapsed before I <seg xml:id="C20_app5-fMS_start"/> <del next="#c57-0031.02" rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0031__main__d4e4832">became informed</del> <lb n="c57-0031__main__3"/><anchor xml:id="c57-0031.03"/><lb n="c57-0031__left_margin__1"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0031__left_margin__d4e4843"> of th </del> <anchor xml:id="c57-0031.01"/><mod sID="c57-0031__main__d4e4849"/> <mdel>of</mdel> <sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0031__main__d4e4853"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c57-0031__main__d4e4853"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0031__main__d4e4859"/>learned <seg xml:id="C20_app5-fMS_end"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0031__main__d4e4859"/><mod eID="c57-0031__main__d4e4849"/>the history of my friends. It was one <seg xml:id="C20_app7-fMS_start"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0031__main__d4e4864">that</del> <lb n="c57-0031__main__4"/><anchor xml:id="c57-0031.05"/><lb n="c57-0031__left_margin__1"/><sga-add hand="#pbs" sID="c57-0031__left_margin__d4e4875"/> which <sga-add eID="c57-0031__left_margin__d4e4875"/><anchor xml:id="c57-0031.04"/>could not fail to impress itself deeply <seg xml:id="C20_app7-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C20_app8-fMS_start"/> <mod sID="c57-0031__main__d4e4881"/> <mdel>in</mdel> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0031__main__d4e4885"/>on <seg xml:id="C20_app8-fMS_end"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0031__main__d4e4885"/><mod eID="c57-0031__main__d4e4881"/>my <seg xml:id="C20_app10-fMS_start"/> <lb n="c57-0031__main__5"/>mind <seg xml:id="C20_app10-fMS_end"/> unfolding as it did a number of <seg xml:id="C20_app12-fMS_start"/> <lb n="c57-0031__main__6"/>circumstances <seg xml:id="C20_app12-fMS_end"/> each <seg xml:id="C20_app14-fMS_start"/> inter <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0031__main__d4e4894">r</del> esting &<w ana="start"/>wonder<lb n="c57-0031__main__7"/>ful<w ana="end"/> <seg xml:id="C20_app14-fMS_end"/> to one so utterly inexperienced as I <lb n="c57-0031__main__8"/>was. <seg xml:id="C20_app16-fMS_start"/> <del rend="vertical_line" xml:id="c57-0031__main__d4e4906"> <unclear>2</unclear> </del> <seg xml:id="C20_app16-fMS_end"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <seg xml:id="C20_app18-fMS_start"/> <lb n="c57-0031__main__9"/>The <seg xml:id="C20_app18-fMS_end"/> name of the old man was De Lacey. <lb n="c57-0031__main__10"/>He was <seg xml:id="C20_app20-fMS_start"/> decended <seg xml:id="C20_app20-fMS_end"/> from a good family in <seg xml:id="C20_app22-fMS_start"/> France <delSpan rend="strikethrough" spanTo="#c57-0031.06"/>&<lb n="c57-0031__main__11"/> untill very lately had lived <delSpan anchor="c57-0031.06"/> where for many years <lb n="c57-0031__main__12"/>he had lived <seg xml:id="C20_app22-fMS_end"/> in <seg xml:id="C20_app24-fMS_start"/> affluence <seg xml:id="C20_app24-fMS_end"/> respected by his <seg xml:id="C20_app26-fMS_start"/> superiors <seg xml:id="C20_app26-fMS_end"/> <lb n="c57-0031__main__13"/>& beloved by his equals. <seg xml:id="C20_app28-fMS_start"/> <delSpan rend="strikethrough" spanTo="#c57-0031.07"/>His two children Felix &<w ana="start"/>Aga<lb n="c57-0031__main__14"/>tha<w ana="end"/><delSpan anchor="c57-0031.07"/> His son was bred <seg xml:id="C20_app28-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C20_app29-fMS_start"/> <mod sID="c57-0031__main__d4e4939"/> <mdel>t</mdel> <sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c57-0031__main__d4e4943"/>i<sga-add eID="c57-0031__main__d4e4943"/><mod eID="c57-0031__main__d4e4939"/>n the service of his <seg xml:id="C20_app29-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C20_app30-fMS_start"/> country <seg xml:id="C20_app30-fMS_end"/> <lb n="c57-0031__main__15"/>& Agatha had <seg xml:id="C20_app32-fMS_start"/> <mod sID="c57-0031__main__d4e4949"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0031__main__d4e4951">been</del> <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0031__main__d4e4954"/>ranked <seg xml:id="C20_app32-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C20_app33-fMS_start"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0031__main__d4e4954"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0031__main__d4e4957">woed</del> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0031__main__d4e4960">by gentlemen</del> <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0031__main__d4e4963"/>with ladies <seg xml:id="C20_app33-fMS_end"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0031__main__d4e4963"/><mod eID="c57-0031__main__d4e4949"/>of the <lb n="c57-0031__main__16"/>highest distinction. A few months <seg xml:id="C20_app35-fMS_start"/> <del next="#c57-0031.09" rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0031__main__d4e4970">previous</del> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0031__main__d4e4973"/>before <seg xml:id="C20_app35-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C20_app36-fMS_start"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0031__main__d4e4973"/><lb n="c57-0031__main__17"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0031__main__d4e4978">to</del> <anchor xml:id="c57-0031.08"/> my <seg xml:id="C20_app36-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C20_app37-fMS_start"/> arrival <seg xml:id="C20_app37-fMS_end"/> they had lived in a large & <w ana="start"/>lux<lb n="c57-0031__main__18"/>urious<w ana="end"/> <seg xml:id="C20_app39-fMS_start"/> city <seg xml:id="C20_app39-fMS_end"/> called Paris, surrounded by <seg xml:id="C20_app41-fMS_start"/> friends <seg xml:id="C20_app41-fMS_end"/> <lb n="c57-0031__main__19"/>& possessed of every enjoyment <seg xml:id="C20_app43-fMS_start"/> that <mod sID="c57-0031__main__d4e4992"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0031__main__d4e4994">that</del> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0031__main__d4e4997"/>which <seg xml:id="C20_app43-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C20_app44-fMS_start"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0031__main__d4e4997"/><mod eID="c57-0031__main__d4e4992"/> virtue <mod sID="c57-0031__main__d4e5001"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0031__main__d4e5003"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c57-0031__main__d4e5003"/><sga-add hand="#pbs" next="#c57-0031.10" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0031__main__d4e5009"/>& <seg xml:id="C20_app44-fMS_end"/> refinement of <seg xml:id="C20_app46-fMS_start"/> intellect & <seg xml:id="C20_app46-fMS_end"/> taste, <sga-add eID="c57-0031__main__d4e5009"/><mod eID="c57-0031__main__d4e5001"/><w ana="start"/>ac<lb n="c57-0031__main__20"/>companied<w ana="end"/> <seg xml:id="C20_app48-fMS_start"/> with <seg xml:id="C20_app48-fMS_end"/> a <seg xml:id="C20_app50-fMS_start"/> competent fortune <seg xml:id="C20_app50-fMS_end"/> could <lb n="c57-0031__main__21"/>afford. <milestone unit="tei:p-END"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <seg xml:id="C20_app52-fMS_start"/> <lb n="c57-0031__main__22"/>The <seg xml:id="C20_app52-fMS_end"/> father of Safie <seg xml:id="C20_app54-fMS_start"/> <mod sID="c57-0031__main__d4e5027"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0031__main__d4e5029">was</del> <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0031__main__d4e5032"/>had been <seg xml:id="C20_app54-fMS_end"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0031__main__d4e5032"/><mod eID="c57-0031__main__d4e5027"/>the cause of their <seg xml:id="C20_app56-fMS_start"/> <lb n="c57-0031__main__23"/><mod sID="c57-0031__main__d4e5038"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0031__main__d4e5040">fall</del> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0031__main__d4e5043"/>ruin; <sga-add eID="c57-0031__main__d4e5043"/><mod eID="c57-0031__main__d4e5038"/> <seg xml:id="C20_app56-fMS_end"/> He was a <seg xml:id="C20_app58-fMS_start"/> <mod sID="c57-0031__main__d4e5047"/> <mdel>t</mdel> <sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c57-0031__main__d4e5051"/>T<sga-add eID="c57-0031__main__d4e5051"/><mod eID="c57-0031__main__d4e5047"/>urkish <seg xml:id="C20_app58-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C20_app59-fMS_start"/> Merchant <seg xml:id="C20_app59-fMS_end"/> and had <seg xml:id="C20_app61-fMS_start"/> <lb n="c57-0031__main__24"/> <del instant="true" rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0031__main__d4e5057">li</del> inhabited Paris for many <seg xml:id="C20_app61-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C20_app62-fMS_start"/> years. When his person <lb n="c57-0031__main__25"/>became <mod sID="c57-0031__main__d4e5063"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0031__main__d4e5065">for some</del> <sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0031__main__d4e5068"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <seg xml:id="C20_app62-fMS_end"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0031__main__d4e5068"/><sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0031__main__d4e5074"/>for some reason which I could not <seg xml:id="C20_app64-fMS_start"/> learn <sga-add eID="c57-0031__main__d4e5074"/><mod eID="c57-0031__main__d4e5063"/> <seg xml:id="C20_app64-fMS_end"/> obnoxious to the <seg xml:id="C20_app66-fMS_start"/> <w ana="start"/>govern<lb n="c57-0031__main__26"/>ment<w ana="end"/>– <seg xml:id="C20_app66-fMS_end"/> He was seized and cast into prison <lb n="c57-0031__main__27"/>the very day that Safie arrived from <w ana="start"/>Constan<lb n="c57-0031__main__28"/>tinople<w ana="end"/> to join him. He was <seg xml:id="C20_app68-fMS_start"/> tried <seg xml:id="C20_app68-fMS_end"/> & condemned <lb n="c57-0031__main__29"/>to death. The injustice of his sentence was very <seg xml:id="C20_app70-fMS_start"/> <lb n="c57-0031__main__30"/>flagrant <seg xml:id="C20_app70-fMS_end"/> All Paris <seg xml:id="C20_app72-fMS_start"/> were indignant <seg xml:id="C20_app72-fMS_end"/> & it <lb n="c57-0031__main__31"/>was judged that his <seg xml:id="C20_app74-fMS_start"/> relig <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0031__main__d4e5100">i</del> ion <seg xml:id="C20_app74-fMS_end"/> and <seg xml:id="C20_app76-fMS_start"/> wealth <lb n="c57-0031__main__32"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0031__main__d4e5105">had been the causes of his condemnation rather</del> <lb n="c57-0032__main__1"/><mod sID="c57-0032__main__d4e5118"/><anchor xml:id="c57-0032.01"/><lb n="c57-0032__left_margin__1"/> <del rend="smear" xml:id="c57-0032__left_margin__d4e5126">than</del> <seg xml:id="C20_app76-fMS_end"/> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="intralinear" sID="c57-0032__left_margin__d4e5129"/>rather <sga-add eID="c57-0032__left_margin__d4e5129"/><sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c57-0032__main__d4e5133"/>than <sga-add eID="c57-0032__main__d4e5133"/><mod eID="c57-0032__main__d4e5118"/>the crime <seg xml:id="C20_app79-fMS_start"/> alledged <seg xml:id="C20_app79-fMS_end"/> against <seg xml:id="C20_app81-fMS_start"/> him<lb n="c57-0032__main__2"/> <anchor xml:id="c57-0032.02"/> <zone corresp="#c57-0032.02" type="left_margin" sID="c57-0032__left_margin"/> <addSpan hand="#pbs" spanTo="#c57-0032.03"/> <lb n="c57-0032__left_margin__1"/>had been the <lb n="c57-0032__left_margin__2"/>cause of his <lb n="c57-0032__left_margin__3"/>condemnation<anchor xml:id="c57-0032.03"/> <zone eID="c57-0032__left_margin"/>Felix was present at his trial; <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0032__main__d4e5155">&</del> <seg xml:id="C20_app81-fMS_end"/> his <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0032__main__d4e5158"/>horror &<sga-add eID="c57-0032__main__d4e5158"/> <seg xml:id="C20_app83-fMS_start"/> in<lb n="c57-0032__main__3"/>dignation <mod sID="c57-0032__main__d4e5163"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0032__main__d4e5165"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c57-0032__main__d4e5165"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0032__main__d4e5171"/>w<mod sID="c57-0032__main__d4e5173"/> <mdel>as</mdel> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="intralinear" sID="c57-0032__main__d4e5177"/>ere <sga-add eID="c57-0032__main__d4e5177"/><mod eID="c57-0032__main__d4e5173"/><sga-add eID="c57-0032__main__d4e5171"/><mod eID="c57-0032__main__d4e5163"/> uncontrolable <seg xml:id="C20_app83-fMS_end"/> when he heard the <seg xml:id="C20_app85-fMS_start"/> <lb n="c57-0032__main__4"/><mod sID="c57-0032__main__d4e5185"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0032__main__d4e5187">event.</del> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0032__main__d4e5190"/> <mdel>of</mdel> decision of the court. <seg xml:id="C20_app85-fMS_end"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0032__main__d4e5190"/><mod eID="c57-0032__main__d4e5185"/>He <seg xml:id="C20_app87-fMS_start"/> made <seg xml:id="C20_app87-fMS_end"/> at that <seg xml:id="C20_app89-fMS_start"/> moment <seg xml:id="C20_app89-fMS_end"/> a solemn <lb n="c57-0032__main__5"/>vow to deliver <seg xml:id="C20_app91-fMS_start"/> him <seg xml:id="C20_app91-fMS_end"/> & then looked around <lb n="c57-0032__main__6"/>for the means. After many fruitless <lb n="c57-0032__main__7"/>attempts to gain admittance to the <seg xml:id="C20_app93-fMS_start"/> <delSpan rend="strikethrough" spanTo="#c57-0032.04"/><w ana="start"/>pri<lb n="c57-0032__main__8"/>son<w ana="end"/><delSpan anchor="c57-0032.04"/><mod sID="c57-0032__main__d4e5214"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0032__main__d4e5216">goal</del> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0032__main__d4e5219"/>prison <sga-add eID="c57-0032__main__d4e5219"/><mod eID="c57-0032__main__d4e5214"/> <seg xml:id="C20_app93-fMS_end"/> he found a <seg xml:id="C20_app95-fMS_start"/> st <mod sID="c57-0032__main__d4e5223"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0032__main__d4e5225"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c57-0032__main__d4e5225"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0032__main__d4e5231"/>r <sga-add eID="c57-0032__main__d4e5231"/><mod eID="c57-0032__main__d4e5223"/> ongly <seg xml:id="C20_app95-fMS_end"/> grated window <lb n="c57-0032__main__9"/>in an unguarded part of the <seg xml:id="C20_app97-fMS_start"/> <mod sID="c57-0032__main__d4e5237"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0032__main__d4e5239">prison</del> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0032__main__d4e5242"/>building, <sga-add eID="c57-0032__main__d4e5242"/><mod eID="c57-0032__main__d4e5237"/><lb n="c57-0032__main__10"/>which <seg xml:id="C20_app97-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C20_app98-fMS_start"/> <del instant="true" rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0032__main__d4e5249">li</del> <del instant="true" rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0032__main__d4e5252">illuminated</del> lighted the dungeon <lb n="c57-0032__main__11"/>of the unfortunate <seg xml:id="C20_app98-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C20_app99-fMS_start"/> Mahometan, who <seg xml:id="C20_app99-fMS_end"/> <lb n="c57-0032__main__12"/>loaded with <seg xml:id="C20_app101-fMS_start"/> chains <seg xml:id="C20_app101-fMS_end"/> waited in despair <lb n="c57-0032__main__13"/>the execution of the barbarous <w ana="start"/>sen<lb n="c57-0032__main__14"/>tence<w ana="end"/>. Felix visited the grate at <seg xml:id="C20_app103-fMS_start"/> night <lb n="c57-0032__main__15"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0032__main__d4e5270">h</del> <seg xml:id="C20_app103-fMS_end"/> and made know<sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0032__main__d4e5273"/>n <sga-add eID="c57-0032__main__d4e5273"/>to the prisoner his <lb n="c57-0032__main__16"/>intentions in his favour. The <seg xml:id="C20_app106-fMS_start"/> Turk <seg xml:id="C20_app106-fMS_end"/> <lb n="c57-0032__main__17"/>amazed and <seg xml:id="C20_app108-fMS_start"/> delighted <seg xml:id="C20_app108-fMS_end"/> endeavoured to <seg xml:id="C20_app110-fMS_start"/> <mod sID="c57-0032__main__d4e5281"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0032__main__d4e5283">warm</del> <anchor xml:id="c57-0032.05"/><lb n="c57-0032__left_margin__1"/><sga-add hand="#pbs" sID="c57-0032__left_margin__d4e5292"/>kindle <sga-add eID="c57-0032__left_margin__d4e5292"/><mod eID="c57-0032__main__d4e5281"/><lb n="c57-0032__main__18"/>the zeal of his <seg xml:id="C20_app110-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C20_app111-fMS_start"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0032__main__d4e5299">promised</del> deliverer by <lb n="c57-0032__main__19"/>promises of reward & wealth. Felix rejected <lb n="c57-0032__main__20"/>his offers with <seg xml:id="C20_app111-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C20_app112-fMS_start"/> contempt <seg xml:id="C20_app112-fMS_end"/> Yet when he <lb n="c57-0032__main__21"/>saw the lovely <seg xml:id="C20_app114-fMS_start"/> Safie <seg xml:id="C20_app114-fMS_end"/> who was allowed <lb n="c57-0032__main__22"/>to visit her <seg xml:id="C20_app116-fMS_start"/> father <seg xml:id="C20_app116-fMS_end"/> & <seg xml:id="C20_app118-fMS_start"/> who <seg xml:id="C20_app118-fMS_end"/> by her <seg xml:id="C20_app120-fMS_start"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0032__main__d4e5311">expressive</del> <lb n="c57-0032__main__23"/>gestures <seg xml:id="C20_app120-fMS_end"/> expressed her lively gratitude, the <lb n="c57-0032__main__24"/>youth could not help owning to his own <seg xml:id="C20_app122-fMS_start"/> <lb n="c57-0032__main__25"/>mind <seg xml:id="C20_app122-fMS_end"/> that the captive possessed a <lb n="c57-0032__main__26"/>treasure which <seg xml:id="C20_app124-fMS_start"/> <mod sID="c57-0032__main__d4e5323"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0032__main__d4e5325"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c57-0032__main__d4e5325"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0032__main__d4e5331"> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0032__main__d4e5333"/>altho it had not en <sga-add eID="c57-0032__main__d4e5333"/> </del> <mod eID="c57-0032__main__d4e5323"/> would fully reward his <lb n="c57-0032__main__27"/>toil & hazard. <milestone unit="tei:p-END"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <seg xml:id="C20_app124-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C20_app125-fMS_start"/> <lb n="c57-0032__main__28"/>The <seg xml:id="C20_app125-fMS_end"/> Turk quickly perceived the <w ana="start"/>im<lb n="c57-0032__main__29"/>pression<w ana="end"/> that his daughter had made on<lb n="c57-0033__main__1"/> <seg xml:id="C20_app127-fMS_start"/> heart of Felix <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0033__main__d4e5361">and resolved to obtain</del> <delSpan spanTo="#c57-0033.01"/>his <lb n="c57-0033__main__2"/> at any price the full zeal <delSpan anchor="c57-0033.01"/> <seg xml:id="C20_app127-fMS_end"/> and <seg xml:id="C20_app129-fMS_start"/> <mod sID="c57-0033__main__d4e5371"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0033__main__d4e5373">re <mod sID="c57-0033__main__d4e5375"/> <mdel/> <sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c57-0033__main__d4e5382"/>s <sga-add eID="c57-0033__main__d4e5382"/> <mod eID="c57-0033__main__d4e5375"/> olved</del> <anchor xml:id="c57-0033.02"/><lb n="c57-0033__left_margin__1"/><sga-add sID="c57-0033__left_margin__d4e5393"/>endeavored <seg xml:id="C20_app129-fMS_end"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0033__left_margin__d4e5393"/><mod eID="c57-0033__main__d4e5371"/><lb n="c57-0033__main__3"/>to secure <seg xml:id="C20_app131-fMS_start"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0033__main__d4e5399">the</del> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0033__main__d4e5402">interrest</del> him <seg xml:id="C20_app131-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C20_app132-fMS_start"/> <mod sID="c57-0033__main__d4e5405"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0033__main__d4e5407">at any pr</del> <sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0033__main__d4e5410"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c57-0033__main__d4e5410"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0033__main__d4e5416"/>more entirely<sga-add eID="c57-0033__main__d4e5416"/><mod eID="c57-0033__main__d4e5405"/> <seg xml:id="C20_app132-fMS_end"/> by <lb n="c57-0033__main__4"/>the promise of her hand in <seg xml:id="C20_app135-fMS_start"/> marriage; <seg xml:id="C20_app135-fMS_end"/> <lb n="c57-0033__main__5"/>Felix was too delicate to accept <seg xml:id="C20_app137-fMS_start"/> <mod sID="c57-0033__main__d4e5425"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0033__main__d4e5427"> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0033__main__d4e5429"/>offer <sga-add eID="c57-0033__main__d4e5429"/> </del> <restore type="smear_strikethrough"> </restore> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0033__main__d4e5439"/>offer <sga-add eID="c57-0033__main__d4e5439"/> <mod eID="c57-0033__main__d4e5425"/> yet <lb n="c57-0033__main__6"/>he looked forward to the probability of <lb n="c57-0033__main__7"/>that event as the consummation of <lb n="c57-0033__main__8"/>his happiness. <milestone unit="tei:p-END"/> <seg xml:id="C20_app137-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C20_app170-fMS_start"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <lb n="c57-0033__main__9"/>The Turk informed Safie of his <lb n="c57-0033__main__10"/>intentions and <lb n="c57-0033__main__11"/><metamark function="separate">_________________________</metamark><lb n="c57-0033__main__12"/> and rank <mod sID="c57-0033__main__d4e5463"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0033__main__d4e5465">her father</del> <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0033__main__d4e5468"/>the merchant <sga-add eID="c57-0033__main__d4e5468"/> <mod eID="c57-0033__main__d4e5463"/> commander <lb n="c57-0033__main__13"/><mod sID="c57-0033__main__d4e5475"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0033__main__d4e5477">her</del> <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0033__main__d4e5480"/>his daughter<sga-add eID="c57-0033__main__d4e5480"/><mod eID="c57-0033__main__d4e5475"/> <seg xml:id="C20_app170-fMS_end"/> to think no more of<mod sID="c57-0033__main__d4e5484"/> <seg xml:id="C20_app172-fMS_start"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0033__main__d4e5486">him</del> <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0033__main__d4e5489"/>her <seg xml:id="C20_app172-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C20_app173-fMS_start"/> lover<sga-add eID="c57-0033__main__d4e5489"/><mod eID="c57-0033__main__d4e5484"/> but to <lb n="c57-0033__main__14"/>repare to return to her native country <lb n="c57-0033__main__15"/>with him.– <seg xml:id="C20_app173-fMS_end"/> The generous nature of Safie <lb n="c57-0033__main__16"/>was outraged by this <seg xml:id="C20_app175-fMS_start"/> command –She <seg xml:id="C20_app175-fMS_end"/> <w ana="start"/>attempt<lb n="c57-0033__main__17"/>ed<w ana="end"/> to expostulate with her <seg xml:id="C20_app177-fMS_start"/> father <seg xml:id="C20_app177-fMS_end"/> but <lb n="c57-0033__main__18"/>he left <seg xml:id="C20_app179-fMS_start"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0033__main__d4e5508">er</del> her <seg xml:id="C20_app179-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C20_app180-fMS_start"/> angrily <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0033__main__d4e5511">re</del> <seg xml:id="C20_app180-fMS_end"/> reiterating his <lb n="c57-0033__main__19"/>tyrannical <seg xml:id="C20_app182-fMS_start"/> <shi rend="underline">command.</shi> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0033__main__d4e5520">orders.</del> <seg xml:id="C20_app182-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C20_app183-fMS_start"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-END"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <seg xml:id="C20_app183-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C20_app184-fMS_start"/> <lb n="c57-0033__main__20"/>A <seg xml:id="C20_app184-fMS_end"/> few days <seg xml:id="C20_app186-fMS_start"/> after <seg xml:id="C20_app186-fMS_end"/> the Turk entered <lb n="c57-0033__main__21"/>his <seg xml:id="C20_app188-fMS_start"/> daughters appartment <seg xml:id="C20_app188-fMS_end"/> and told her <seg xml:id="C20_app190-fMS_start"/> <lb n="c57-0033__main__22"/>hastily <seg xml:id="C20_app190-fMS_end"/> that he had reason to believe <lb n="c57-0033__main__23"/>that his residence <seg xml:id="C20_app192-fMS_start"/> in <seg xml:id="C20_app192-fMS_end"/> Leghorn had been <seg xml:id="C20_app194-fMS_start"/> <lb n="c57-0033__main__24"/>divulged <seg xml:id="C20_app194-fMS_end"/> and that he <seg xml:id="C20_app196-fMS_start"/> <mod sID="c57-0033__main__d4e5536"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0033__main__d4e5538">would</del> <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0033__main__d4e5541"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0033__main__d4e5543">was</del> should <seg xml:id="C20_app196-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C20_app197-fMS_start"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0033__main__d4e5541"/> <mdel>b</mdel> <mod eID="c57-0033__main__d4e5536"/> speedily <lb n="c57-0033__main__25"/>be delivered <seg xml:id="C20_app197-fMS_end"/>

Abinger c. 57" base="ox-ms_abinger_c57/ox-ms_abinger_c57-0034.xml" id="ox-ms_abinger_c57-0034" sID="ox-ms_abinger_c57-0034"/><graphic url="http://shelleygodwinarchive.org/images/ox/ms_abinger_c57/ms_abinger_c57-0034.jp2"/><zone type="main" sID="c57-0034__main"/><lb n="c57-0034__main__1"/>to <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0034__main__d4e5585">Can</del> Constantinople <mod sID="c57-0034__main__d4e5588"/> <mdel>in</mdel> <seg xml:id="C20_app200-fMS_end"/> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0034__main__d4e5592"/>for <sga-add eID="c57-0034__main__d4e5592"/><mod eID="c57-0034__main__d4e5588"/>which <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0034__main__d4e5596"/>city <sga-add eID="c57-0034__main__d4e5596"/>he should <lb n="c57-0034__main__2"/>sail in few hours. He intended to leave his <lb n="c57-0034__main__3"/>daughter <seg xml:id="C20_app206-fMS_start"/> <del instant="true" rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0034__main__d4e5604">to foll</del> under the care of a <seg xml:id="C20_app206-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C20_app207-fMS_start"/> servant <seg xml:id="C20_app207-fMS_end"/> <lb n="c57-0034__main__4"/>to follow at her leisure with the greater part <lb n="c57-0034__main__5"/>of his <seg xml:id="C20_app209-fMS_start"/> property <seg xml:id="C20_app209-fMS_end"/> which had not yet arrived <lb n="c57-0034__main__6"/>at Leghorn. <milestone unit="tei:p-END"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <seg xml:id="C20_app211-fMS_start"/> <lb n="c57-0034__main__7"/> <del instant="true" rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0034__main__d4e5618">Lef</del> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0034__main__d4e5621">Deserted by her father</del> <seg xml:id="C20_app211-fMS_end"/> Safie <seg xml:id="C20_app213-fMS_start"/> revolved <seg xml:id="C20_app213-fMS_end"/> <lb n="c57-0034__main__8"/>in her own mind the <seg xml:id="C20_app215-fMS_start"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0034__main__d4e5626">various</del> plan <seg xml:id="C20_app215-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C20_app216-fMS_start"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0034__main__d4e5629">s</del> of <w ana="start"/>con<lb n="c57-0034__main__9"/>duct<w ana="end"/> that it would become her to pursue <lb n="c57-0034__main__10"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0034__main__d4e5641"/>in this emergency. <seg xml:id="C20_app216-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C20_app217-fMS_start"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0034__main__d4e5641"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0034__main__d4e5644">The slavery</del> A residence in Turkey was <w ana="start"/>ab<lb n="c57-0034__main__11"/>horrent<w ana="end"/> to <seg xml:id="C20_app217-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C20_app218-fMS_start"/> her – <seg xml:id="C20_app218-fMS_end"/> her religion & feelings were <lb n="c57-0034__main__12"/>alike adverse to it. By some papers <seg xml:id="C20_app222-fMS_start"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0034__main__d4e5656">that</del> <lb n="c57-0034__main__13"/>of her <seg xml:id="C20_app222-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C20_app223-fMS_start"/> fathers that <seg xml:id="C20_app223-fMS_end"/> fell into her <seg xml:id="C20_app225-fMS_start"/> hands <seg xml:id="C20_app225-fMS_end"/> she <lb n="c57-0034__main__14"/>heard of the exile of her <seg xml:id="C20_app227-fMS_start"/> lover <seg xml:id="C20_app227-fMS_end"/> and <seg xml:id="C20_app229-fMS_start"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0034__main__d4e5664">the</del> <lb n="c57-0034__main__15"/>learnt the name of the spot where <lb n="c57-0034__main__16"/>he <seg xml:id="C20_app229-fMS_end"/> resided. She hesitated some <seg xml:id="C20_app231-fMS_start"/> time <seg xml:id="C20_app231-fMS_end"/> but at <lb n="c57-0034__main__17"/>length she formed her <seg xml:id="C20_app233-fMS_start"/> resolution —Taking <seg xml:id="C20_app233-fMS_end"/> <lb n="c57-0034__main__18"/>with her some jewels that belonged to her, <lb n="c57-0034__main__19"/>and a <seg xml:id="C20_app235-fMS_start"/> small <seg xml:id="C20_app235-fMS_end"/> sum of <seg xml:id="C20_app237-fMS_start"/> money; <seg xml:id="C20_app237-fMS_end"/> she quitted <seg xml:id="C20_app239-fMS_start"/> <lb n="c57-0034__main__20"/>Italy <seg xml:id="C20_app239-fMS_end"/> with <seg xml:id="C20_app241-fMS_start"/> a <sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c57-0034__main__d4e5680"/>n <sga-add eID="c57-0034__main__d4e5680"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0034__main__d4e5683">servant who</del> attendant <seg xml:id="C20_app241-fMS_end"/> a <lb n="c57-0034__main__21"/>native of <seg xml:id="C20_app243-fMS_start"/> Leghorn <seg xml:id="C20_app243-fMS_end"/> but who understood <seg xml:id="C20_app245-fMS_start"/> <delSpan rend="strikethrough" spanTo="#c57-0034.02"/>Tur <lb n="c57-0034__main__22"/>kish <delSpan anchor="c57-0034.02"/><sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c57-0034__main__d4e5695"/>Arabic <sga-add eID="c57-0034__main__d4e5695"/><anchor xml:id="c57-0034.01"/> <seg xml:id="C20_app245-fMS_end"/> and departed for Germany. <seg xml:id="C20_app247-fMS_start"/> She arrived <lb n="c57-0034__main__23"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0034__main__d4e5702">safely</del> <seg xml:id="C20_app247-fMS_end"/> in safety at a town about <seg xml:id="C20_app249-fMS_start"/> <mod sID="c57-0034__main__d4e5706"/> <mdel>50</mdel> <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0034__main__d4e5710"/>20 <sga-add eID="c57-0034__main__d4e5710"/><mod eID="c57-0034__main__d4e5706"/> <seg xml:id="C20_app249-fMS_end"/> leagues <lb n="c57-0034__main__24"/>from the Cottage of De <seg xml:id="C20_app251-fMS_start"/> Lacey – <seg xml:id="C20_app251-fMS_end"/> her attendant <seg xml:id="C20_app253-fMS_start"/> <lb n="c57-0034__main__25"/>then fell <seg xml:id="C20_app253-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C20_app254-fMS_start"/> <mod sID="c57-0034__main__d4e5718"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c57-0034__main__d4e5720"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c57-0034__main__d4e5720"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0034__main__d4e5726"/>dangerously <seg xml:id="C20_app254-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C20_app255-fMS_start"/> <sga-add eID="c57-0034__main__d4e5726"/><mod eID="c57-0034__main__d4e5718"/> ill <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0034__main__d4e5730">and she was retarded wh</del> <seg xml:id="C20_app255-fMS_end"/> Safie <seg xml:id="C20_app257-fMS_start"/> <lb n="c57-0034__main__26"/> <del instant="true" rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0034__main__d4e5736">watched</del> nursed her with the most devoted <seg xml:id="C20_app257-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C20_app258-fMS_start"/> <lb n="c57-0034__main__27"/>affection <seg xml:id="C20_app258-fMS_end"/> but the poor girl <seg xml:id="C20_app260-fMS_start"/> died <seg xml:id="C20_app260-fMS_end"/> &<mod sID="c57-0034__main__d4e5741"/> <seg xml:id="C20_app262-fMS_start"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0034__main__d4e5743">Safie</del> <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c57-0034__main__d4e5746"/>the Arabian <sga-add eID="c57-0034__main__d4e5746"/><mod eID="c57-0034__main__d4e5741"/><lb n="c57-0034__main__28"/>was left <seg xml:id="C20_app262-fMS_end"/>
<seg xml:id="C20_app263-fMS_start"/> alone <seg xml:id="C20_app263-fMS_end"/> unacquainted with the <w ana="start"/>lan<lb n="c57-0035__main__1"/>guage<w ana="end"/> of the <seg xml:id="C20_app265-fMS_start"/> country <seg xml:id="C20_app265-fMS_end"/> and utterly ignorant of <lb n="c57-0035__main__2"/>the customs of the world.– She <seg xml:id="C20_app267-fMS_start"/> fell <del instant="true" rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c57-0035__main__d4e5769">hover</del> however <lb n="c57-0035__main__3"/>in to <seg xml:id="C20_app267-fMS_end"/> good <seg
